snippet: SeedInvest is teaming up with Gust, a 10-year-old network that includes thousands of angel investors, to offer start-up financing deals to a broad base of investors.
abstract: SeedInvest is teaming up with Gust, a 10-year-old network that includes thousands of angel investors, to offer start-up financing deals to a broad base of investors.

headline.main: Crowdfunding Site SeedInvest Strikes Deal to Widen Its Reach
